name: Wing Commander 2: Vengeance of the Kilrathi
name_original: Wing Commander 2: Vengeance of the Kilrathi
description:
Wing Commander 2: Vengeance of the Kilrathi is an action-simulation game developed by Origin Systems. It was originally released in 1991. It was published by Origin Systems. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Wing Commander 2: Vengeance of the Kilrathi is available on PC.
It was produced by Chris Roberts, Dallas Snell, Dallas Snell (game) and Joel Manners. Joel Manners, Stephen Beeman and Warren Spector directed the game. It was scored by Dana Karl Glover, David Govett, George Alistair Sanger and Kirk Winterrowd.
